1.text: Pour 1⁄2 to 1 cup (120 to 240 ml) of liquid into a blender.

2.text: Put 2 to 3 cups (350 to 525 g) of fruit into the blender.

3.text: Scoop in additional dairy if you'd like to thicken the smoothie.

4.text: Include spices, herbs, or flavorings to make a unique smoothie.

5.text: Add nut butter, oats, or nuts to give the smoothie a filling texture.

6.text: Include a scoop of protein powder or your favorite supplement.

7.text: Mix in your choice of sweetener according to your taste.

8.text: Add about 1 cup (220 g) of ice.

9.text: Cover the blender and blend the smoothie for about 1 minute.

10.text: Add vegetables if you'd like a fresh-tasting smoothie that isn't very sweet.

11.text: Create a creamy smoothie with mangoes and peaches.

12.text: Make a classic strawberry banana smoothie.

13.text: Blend spinach with berries to make a vegan green smoothie.

14.text: Mix frozen blueberries with coconut milk for a refreshing smoothie.

15.text: Combine cold coffee with milk for a coffee protein smoothie.

16.text: Blend citrus fruits with mango and pineapple for a sunny-looking smoothie.

17.text: Whip up a rich chocolate peanut butter smoothie.
